response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value for us, and we believe it would be a perfect match for your needs, given its worth of $1,200,000 to you. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $1,150,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a unique chance to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate. We look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 1150000}
